project_abstract.cdata: The Social Protection Support Project aims to improve the administration of the Housing and Municipal Service Allowance Program (HMSAP) by: 1) automating the processing of applications and data in the administrative offices; and 2) piloting a system to electronically link the local HMSAP administrative offices, the regional HMSAP offices and the Ministry of Social Protection (MSP) and monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of the program. The project will include the installation of hardware and training of staff in system operations and will consist of: 1) automation of data processing in HMSAP administrative offices; 2) management information system; 3) training and technical support; and 4) project administration, monitoring and evaluation.
